SEARCH
Package com.marianobonansea.todoapp.controller

Class TaskViewController

java.lang.Object
com.marianobonansea.todoapp.controller.TaskViewController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/") public class TaskViewController extends Object
Controller for handling task-related web views and templates. This controller manages the web interface for task operations: - GET /: Displays the main task list page - POST /: Handles task creation form submission - GET /{id}/delete: Processes task deletion requests - GET /{id}/toggle: Handles task completion status toggle All operations redirect back to the main view after completion.
